description: Demolition of existing industrial building and partial demolition of the existing Tram Shed, and erection of five buildings ranging in height from two storeys to seven storeys, including the renovation of the Tram Shed, for a mixed use development comprising 85 residential units, and 1867 sqm of use Class B1(c) (light industrial) floorspace, with associated landscaping, parking and a new pedestrian route linking Casimir Road to Upper Clapton Road.
